column4: hi, i just installed ubuntu 8.10 how do i install the restricted drivers?
sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras
that's it? i'm using nvidia.
what are you trying to install exactly?
an nvidia graphic card, i guess...
that should be accessed ... deany beat me
yes
i clicked "activate"  but it still not activated.. maybe the drivers server is down?
can you install other things? Kinda sounds like you borked your sources
i just installed ubuntu.. what do you recommend i should try to test?
in a terminal type sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras
and wth is borked? :-D
do you have synaptic open?
you forgot 'install'
yep
pastebin your /etc/apt/sources.list
ok hang on please
ok try this in a terminal: dpkg --configure -a    (if that dont work try this): sudo rm /var/lib/dpkg/lock
how's it going? You got kind of quiet :)
do you have a License agreement open? such as from installing Java?
try lsof /var/lib/dpkg/lock  and see what's locking it
woot! :)
just ignore the other "chefs" in this kitchen, you got your flash and java now. :)
anytime :)
